title: Can Xbox Outlast the AI Bubble?
full_text: Can Xbox Outlast the AI Bubble?. Microsoft is pouring money into AI, but Xbox is dragging down the company's entire hardware business.. The great green X that brought us joy over 27 years of gaming history is once again suffering from poor hardware sales and declining revenue from its cloud-based subscriptions. This is only another n… [+5184 chars]
